text: I don’t get why a malaria trtmnt is fast-tracked when malaria doesn’t even spread human-to-human (transmitted by mosquito bite.) #Chloroquine might even make #COVID19 worse. #Ebola otoh, spreads thru droplets just like COVID. So why not focus on #Remdesivir from #GILEAD instead? https://t.co/37uqlI6Wib
